overview:
Barry has over 30 years experience investing in and leading high growth companies. Previously he was Chairman & CEO of MacGregor Golf; Chairman & CEO of MSA Industries, which he grew from a few people to 2,000 employees and sold to DuPont; and Managing Partner of The Parkside Group, LLC.

LOYAL3 offers a technology platform, CSOP™, that enables people to buy stock directly from their favorite companies, right from a company’s Facebook page and website in 3 simple steps, invest as little as $10 and pay no fees, ever. CSOPs also provide people affordable access to IPOs at the same price as institutions. UCLA BA.
